label.disableParentCanonicalInheritance: For this product, DO NOT output the canonical URL of the parent product for the variants
label.enableParentCanonicalInheritance: For this product, output the canonical URL of the parent product for the variants

helpText.robotsTag:
At this point you can define the robots tag that will be displayed on the page.

If "Transfer default value" is selected, the robots tag value is transferred, which you can find under SEO Professional » Additional Settings » SEO Settings » Meta Tags » Robots Tag configured.
helpText.disableParentCanonicalInheritance:
Since the option "For variants, generally output the canonical URL of the parent product" is activated in the SEO Professional settings (SEO Professional » More settings » Canonical URLs), the canonical URL of the parent product is used.

If this option is active, you can deactivate this setting for this product and define your own canonical URLs for the variants.
helpText.enableParentCanonicalInheritance:
If this option is active, the canonical URL of the parent product will be displayed for all variants of this product.

This is the canonical URL that you can enter in the current tab under SEO URLs » Canonical Link.

Note:
This setting can also be set globally for all variants (see: SEO Professional » More Settings » Canonical URLs)

robotsTags.useDefault: Transfer default value (SEO Professional » Additional Settings » SEO Settings » Meta Tags » Robots Tag)
robotsTags.noindexFollow: noindex, follow (do not index page, follow links)
robotsTags.indexNoFollow: index, nofollow (index page, do not track links)
robotsTags.noindexNoFollow: noindex, nofollow (do not index page, do not track links)

seoFormBulkInfo.noBulkConfigurationAvailableText: No bulk template has been configured for this SEO setting
seoFormBulkInfo.overwriteWarnText: Changes to this SEO setting will be overwritten when you save, because the "always overwrite value" bulk setting is active.

notValidSalesChannel.defaultText: Please select a storefront sales channel to view the SERP preview.
notValidSalesChannel.noDomainMatchedText: The selected storefront sales channel does not have a domain for the active language.

seoUrl.notModifiedText: The current URL was generated by the Shopware standard. This will be overwritten in the next bulk process.

disableVariantCanonicalFunctionsNotice.title: Output of the canonical URL of the parent product is active
disableVariantCanonicalFunctionsNotice.text:
Since the option "For variants, generally output the canonical URL of the parent product" is activated in the SEO Professional settings (SEO Professional » Additional settings » Canonical URLs), the canonical URL of the parent product is used.

If you want to define your own canonical URLs for variants of this product, you must activate the option "Do NOT display the canonical URL of the parent product for the variants of this product". You can find this in the parent product under "SEO » Meta-Tags".
disableVariantCanonicalFunctionsNotice.textIndividual: Since the option "For this product, output the canonical URL of the parent product for the variants" is active in the parent product, the canonical URL of the parent product is used.

helpText.canonicalLinkType:
By default, the defined SEO path is also output as a canonical link. You can use this option to define alternative sources for the canonical link.

For example, you can refer to a follow-up article or to a specific variant to avoid duplicate content.

canonicalLinkTypes.UseSeoPath: Output the SEO path as a canonical link
canonicalLinkTypes.ExternalUrl: Output external URL as canonical link
canonicalLinkTypes.ProductUrl: Output the URL of a product as a canonical link
canonicalLinkTypes.CategoryUrl: Output the URL of a category as a canonical link

placeholder.customSku: Use default (SEO Professional » Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) » Products)
placeholder.customMpn: Use default (SEO Professional » Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) » Products)

helpText.itemCondition:
If no deviating product status is defined here, the default value applies.

This can be defined under "SEO Professional » Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) » Products"
helpText.availability:
If no deviating product availability is defined here, the default value applies.

This can be defined under "SEO Professional » Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) » Products"
helpText.customSku:
If no different dealer-specific identifier is defined here, the default value applies.

This can be defined under "SEO Professional » Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) » Products"
helpText.customMpn:
If no different manufacturer part number is defined here, the default value applies.

This can be defined under "SEO Professional» Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) »Products"
helpText.priceValidUntilDate:
If no different "price valid to" date is defined here, the default value applies.

This can be defined under "SEO Professional» Rich Snippets (JSON-LD) »Products"

helpText.facebookTitle: The title defined here is output when the page is shared on Facebook.
helpText.twitterTitle: The title defined here is output when the page is shared on Twitter.
helpText.facebookDescription: The description text defined here is output when the page is shared on Facebook.
helpText.twitterDescription: The description text defined here is output when the page is shared on Twitter.

label.productSitemapInactive: DO NOT show product in sitemap
label.categorySitemapInactive: DO NOT show listing in sitemap
label.landingPageSitemapInactive: DO NOT show landing page in sitemap

helpText.productSitemapInactive: If this option is activated, the page will NOT be displayed in the sitemap.
helpText.productSitemapPriority: The priority indicates how important the URL is compared to other URLs on the website. The value can be between 0.0 and 1.0. The default value is 0.5.
helpText.categorySitemapInactive: If this option is activated, the page will NOT be displayed in the sitemap.
helpText.categorySitemapPriority: The priority indicates how important the URL is compared to other URLs on the website. The value can be between 0.0 and 1.0. The default value is 0.5.
helpText.landingPageSitemapInactive: If this option is activated, the page will NOT be displayed in the sitemap.
helpText.landingPageSitemapPriority: The priority indicates how important the URL is compared to other URLs on the website. The value can be between 0.0 and 1.0. The default value is 0.5.
